name: Hypnosis (itch) (GRTMedia)
description:
A GAME BY GABZ, RYAN AND THOMAS

Ash wakes up inside a cave and is met by Morpheus, the God of Dreams. Morpheus the God of Dreams will guide Ash through the journey.
Morpheus explains that, Hypnos the God of Sleep and father of Morpheus is the antagonist of the game. Has put the world into an everlasting slumber and Ash will need to collect these relics at the end of each level to restore the consciousness to the world. Morpheus guides you throughout each level with learning new mechanics etc.

WASD or arrow keys to move left and right

Space key to jump

Space key twice to double jump

E to call Lift

Pre - alpha build.

Please give feedback on any bugs and general gameplay/ideas to add in further development.

CURRENT KNOWN BUGS/PROBLEMS:

  • Spamming Double jump makes the character do infinity jumps.
  •  The player's animation for jumping to idle then running, makes the player slide.
  • The Jump height may change in different places.
  • Seeing through small gaps in the walls due to render distance.
